# Packages from CRAN

```{r}
##################### Packages from CRAN

cran_pkgs <-
  c(
    "BiocManager",
    "covr",
    "devtools",
    "httr",
    "knitr",
    "rematch",
    "rematch2",
    "rmarkdown",
    "selectr",
    "tidyverse",
    "usethis",
    "webshot"
  )

install.packages(cran_pkgs[!cran_pkgs %in% installed.packages()],
                 dependencies = c("Depends", "Suggests"))

webshot::install_phantomjs()
```

# GitHub

```{r}
github_packages <- c(
  "ropenscilabs/available",
  "rstudio/blogdown",
  "rstudio/bookdown",
  "jennybc/cellranger",
  "ropenscilabs/skimr",
  "ismayc/thesisdown",
  "tidymodels/tidymodels"
)

devtools::install_github(
  github_packages[!github_packages %in% installed.packages()],
  force = TRUE,
  dependencies = c("Depends", "Suggests"),
)
```

# Bioconductor

```{r}
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install()

bioc_packages <- c(
  "scRNAseq", 
  "simpleSingleCell")
tmp <- sapply(
  bioc_packages[! bioc_packages %in% installed.packages()],
  function(pkg) BiocManager::install(pkg, version = "devel")
)
```
